EmailTemplate.subject: Finally — an ATM channel solution that manages costs and resources
EmailTemplate.textOnly: As banks try to meet every financial need for their customers, while delivering their expectations for great experiences, resources get stretched. What's more, you’re being tasked with making significant cost savings. We have one great way to combine managing costs and resources. With NCR ATM as a Service, we can take the day-to-day ownership of running and managing your ATM estate. You can get a single point of contact and accountability for every aspect of running this vital channel – while you and your team can focus on innovation and delivering that connected customer experience.
